transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir, am I ha sir good afternoon kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ji good afternoon theek hai aap bataiye theek hai?
Executive: Ha sir main bhi theek hun bataiye sir aap mujhe aapne call lagaya bataiye sir mera mera profile kaun de raha hai Ma Gauri project ke naam se bata sakte hain aap?
Executive: Ma Gauri project ke naam se sir aapka jo profile Bhanu hai.
Customer: Ha Bhanu ji
Customer: Unko number hai kya?
Executive: Ha sir bataiye main handle kar raha hun aapki profile main Bhanu mera aap discussion bhi ho rakha hai services ke upar aap bataiye sir isme kya problem aa raha hai ya bataiye.
Customer: Ek minute thoda sa baat kijiye Shashikant ji baat kar rahe hain na?
Executive: Ji ji
Customer: Ha Shashikant ji bataiye na sir kya isme aap chahte hain bataiye mujhe.
Customer: Sir isko main cha raha hun khud hi main matlab ki isse main dekh paun handle kuch edit kar paun kya main kar sakta hun kya ID password access kiske paas hai kuch mil jayega hame?
Executive: Dekhiye sir IndiaMART ka jo account hota hai iska koi ID password nahi hota hai ye na sir aap apne number se ja ke login karoge to number par ek verification code aata hai teen digit char digit ka wo aap usme daloge to wo login ho jata hai kyunki password kya hai password koi bhi aapka pata laga sakta hai but jab tak number par verification code nahi jayega tab tak login nahi main laptop pe apne login karna cha raha hun us profile ko mobile mein to hai mere.
Executive: Achcha laptop mein hai to laptop mein sir aap ek bar koi bhi browser open kijiye Chrome Chrome browser open kijiye Google open kijiye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Hmm ha ab waha par daliye sir seller
Customer: Aati hai bhai
Customer: Nahi nahi aa raha hai sir
Executive: S e daliye
Customer: Ji sir
Customer: Ha fir se bulaiyega
Executive: Ha aap sir Google pe search kijiye seller.indiamart S E double L E R
Customer: Ha seller fir hot lagana hai aapko fir IndiaMART
Customer: Ha
Customer: Theek hai uske chale gaye open ho gaya
Executive: Ha ab waha par sir aapko number apna jo registered number hai aapka main bata deta hun kaun aapka registered number sir Ma Gauri projects ke liye usme sir last mein hai 102
Customer: 102 last mein hai?
Executive: Ha last mein 102 hai us number se aap isme login kijiye.
Customer: Okay
Customer: Login baat kar rahe ho
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji sir
Customer: Login kar liya sir aapne?
Executive: Abhi kiya nahi hun abhi baithunga system pe to login karunga aur dusri cheez isse main karna cha raha tha kyunki mera koi project dikh nahi raha hai main koi bhi keyword search kar raha hun aise IndiaMART pe bhi ja ke dusre logon ko jo hamare competitor hain unka profile dikh raha hai hamara profile kyun dikh hi nahi raha hai ek mahine se aisa kyun hai sahi nahi dikh raha hai koi bhi keyword search karta hun uske andar mein.
Executive: Achcha wo na sir kya hai aap
Customer: Ha bilkul sir aap mujhe bataenge aap kis location mein dekh rahe the apne aap ko kyunki IndiaMART mein alag alag location pe Gurgaon mein?
Customer: Ha
Executive: Ha to main batata hun sir aapko Gurgaon mein abhi aapki kya positioning hai agar main aapki baat karu aapki profile ki aap bataiye aap kya keyword search karte hain sir?
Customer: A core cutting ya rewiring ka maine do keyword se dekha tha search karke aise kisi ko rewiring karani hai rewiring ka ya core cutting karana hai to black cut karna hai koi bhi keyword hai mera project ka wo naam kahin aa hi nahi raha hai profile pe kisi ka bhi pata aa raha hai to jaise man ha aa raha hai
Executive: Ha jaise sir main baat karu agar RCC core cutting ki main baat karta hun theek hai?
Customer: Ha hello RCC core cutting mein sir aap Gurgaon Gurgaon shahar mein sir aap teesre number par aa rahe ho sabse pehle aa rahe hain RS ke contract fir Jai Mata di projects fir aap ji
Customer: Jai Mata di projects ko to main janta hun hamare competitor hi hain ha ha wo second number pe aa rahe hain aur third number pe number pe sir aap aa rahe ho ha third number pe aur fourth number pe aa raha hai Mata ji project lekin Ma Gauri project to nahi aa raha tha kal raat mein baith ke hum logon ne char panch log kai keyword alag alag mobile pe bhi search karke dekhe IndiaMART open karke aur isliye to aapko call kar rahe the ki kahin profile ek mahine se koi call nahi aa rahi thi ya koi mera profile dikh hi nahi raha tha isliye pata kiya kaun hamara project handle kar raha hai to isliye aapko baat hua ise dekhiye isko optimize kariye alag alag keyword se jo kuch aaye hamare paas paise laga rahe hain to isse koi benefit nahi hai hamara.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir bilkul sir jaisa aap chahte hain main isko bilkul waisa hi optimize kar dunga iski isko lekar befikar rahe bas usme sir mujhe aapka thoda sa contribution chahiye hoga because at the end sir user aap ho aur profile aapka hai hai na to jaise ki main jaise agar aap chahte hain ki aap Gurgaon location mein aap top five mein jaise abhi dikh rahe ho RCC core cutting mein aise aap other categories mein bhi dikhu other keyword mein bhi dikhu jaise ki rubber rubber flexing services concrete core cutting service diamond core cutting service to in sab categories mein na sir aapko Gurgaon shahar ki lead search karke consume karni padegi aap jin jin category mein jis jis shahar ki lead consume karoge automatically aapki preference waha banti jayegi aur fir agar koi bhi aake search karega to aapka profile top five supplier mein aapko show hoga.
Customer: Achcha khud hi mujhe search karke wo karna padega.
Executive: Ha matlab ki ek to sir hamara software hai jo ki aapke aapke sath matchmaking karke aapko Gurgaon ki aur aur bhi jo bhi aapki cities hai preferred cities waha ki lead aapko bhejta hai aap to top par dikh rahi hoti hai aap consume kar lete ho Faridabad ki New Delhi ki Delhi ki Ghaziabad ki Noida ki par jin jin shahar mein aap chahte ho na ki main top par dikhu meri waha par ranking achchi ho theek hai to aap aur particularly us keyword mein us keyword mein agar aake koi search karta hai to main top five mein dikhu to aap us keyword ki lead IndiaMART pe search karo us shahar ke according ye ek chota sa solution hai us customer tak pahunchne ke liye to isse kya rahega na sir automatically aapka preference ban jayega ab ye lead jo consume ki jati hai sir ye aap hi kar sakte hain iska hamare paas koi access nahi hai aur kis shahar mein lead consume karni hai wo bhi sir aapki choice hai main yaha khali aapko guide kar sakta hun ki jaise aapko agar chahte ho ki main New Delhi mein RCC concrete mein main top one pe dikhu ya top five mein dikhu to ha aapko RCC core cutting services mera profile handle kar rahe the wo ek bar do mahine to feedback le lete the aur kuch na kuch suggestion dete the lekin ab koi suggestion nahi deta hai na koi feedback na koi call aa rahi hai na query aa rahi hai to dikat hai ye sab cheeze hame pata nahi hai na achcha achcha achcha karenge to hum karenge bilkul sir bilkul to ab jaisa ki ab aap se aap se mera ek bar discussion ho gaya hai is cheez ke upar to ab sir aapko ye clarity aa gayi hai ya main aap chahte hain main isko ek bar aur explain karu isme kuch aapko doubt aa raha ho to main login karunga abhi main soch raha hun ki abhi to maine system pe login karke man lijiye query jo main click karunga man lijiye ki koi ne apna query dal rakha hai usko main click karunga to aapko kaise pata chalega ki maine is query ko accept kiya hai kam kiya hai ki nahi kiya hai sir mujhe aise pata chalega ki sir mujhe aise pata chalega jo bhi lead ha ha to sir mujhe aise pata chalega jo bhi lead consume karte ho na to mere paas uska data aa jata hai jaise ki abhi agar main aaj ki tarikh ki baat karu 28 tarikh ki ne lead kiye aur ye thi anchor flexing services ki ha hai na to ye aaj aapne 28 tarikh ko consume kari ek sir aapne consume kari hai core cutting service Vipin naam tha inka Faridabad jin jin shahar ki lead consume karoge aur jis category mein karoge mere paas sir automatically yaha par update aa jayega main yaha se isko monitor karta rehta hun okay to ek ek kam karte hain sir ek kam karte hain for better clarity hum ek video meeting schedule kar lete hain aap apna ek thoda sa samay nikal ke 10-15 minute ka aap apna laptop lekar baithiyega usme main aapko pehle to login kara dunga IndiaMART theek hai aur uske baad main aapko do teen do teen cheeze main aapko video meet pe agar dikhaunga competition bhi dikhaunga ki aap kaun se number pe aa rahe ho Gurgaon mein Delhi mein New Delhi mein Faridabad mein to aapko bahut theek hai to main sir agar aapko 4:30 baje ka 4:30 baje aap free rahenge aaj bilkul hame kam nahi hai project lene ke liye to main free rahunga aap time bata denge to time nikal lunga 4:30 baje aaj sham ko 4:30 baje sir theek hai 4:30 baje meeting rakhte hain 4:30 baje meeting karte hain to tab tak sir main aapka concern close kar du ya fir jo bhi aapko doubt aa raha tha ki kaise ranking improve kar sakte hain ji kar dijiye theek hai to 4:30 baje aapko definitely sir main aapko improvement la ke dunga aapki profile mein aap mujh pe vishwas kijiye sir 4:30 baje ek bar video meet karte hain main aapko improvement la ke dunga bilkul sir theek hai sir thank you so much sir okay thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to handle and edit profile himself.

- Project not visible on IndiaMART.

- No calls or queries received in a month.



Resolution:

- Explained the login process for IndiaMART.

- Explained how to improve ranking by consuming leads.

- Scheduled a video meeting for better clarity.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for 4:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, visibility, leads, ranking, login
